title: Summoner spells and trinket timers
body: Riot i was think if this would be a good idea since it will help the team more better. My idea is that it would be a lot easy if we know the timers for our allies summoner spells flash egnite etc. and trinket display on our screen so we know when to engage or stuff like that and not do stupid mistakes like going in without knowing our team or one of our members spell timers and trinket.COMMENT IF YOU AGREE OR DISAGREE

replies.body:
And where per se' will 12 new timers be placed on the HUD?

Don't really care about the summoner spells and especially don't care about trinket timers LOL its important for botlane yes, but not really anyone else

I'd rather a timer to their Ults instead of a green light. Also a "warded" or "ward here" ping first too.
